summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Fire Code Enforcement; authorizing implementation of Article 80 of the Code; increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1991 Budget of the Fire Department by reduction, reappropriation, and transfer from the Department of Finance General, authorizing the Purchasing Agent, with the cooperation of the Director of Administrative Services, to amend a contract, and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1991 Budget of the Department of Administrative Services by appropriation and transfer from the Administrative Services Fund, all by three-fourths vote of the City Council.
